channel.title: Help Please
channel.description: Can someone pm me/im me on msn how to increase max stat to 200 or anything higher then 99 really....lol thanks

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

In your client, right now yours looks like this if you have 99 as a max stat

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 99; }

Read full topic

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 200; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 400.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 200; }

Read full topic

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @InfoManiac InfoManiac
item.description:
@InfoManiac wrote:

Put this in run.bat and run your server then you are done…

[code]@echo off
title 100+ Skills
Echo Changing Attack to raise higher than 99
Echo Changing Strength to raise higher than 99
Echo Changing Defense to raise higher than 99
Echo Changing Hit Points to raise higher than 99
Echo Changing Range to raise higher than 99
Echo Changing Magic to raise higher than 99
Echo Changing Prayer to raise higher than 99
Echo Changing All Non-Combat skills to raise higher than 99

Echo Importing into Source
Echo Importing into Source
Echo Importing into Source
Echo Importing into Source
Echo Importing into Source
Echo Importing into Source
Echo Importing into Source
Echo Importing into Source
Echo Importing into Source

y
